text: Thom Tillis (born August 30, 1960) is the senior United States Senator from North Carolina. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 2015. He was in the North Carolina House of Representatives from 2007 to 2015. Tillis was born on August 30, 1960 in Jacksonville, Florida. He graduated from the University of Maryland University College. He is married to Susan Tillis. They have two children. Tillis tested positive for coronavirus on October 2, 2020, after an event with Donald Trump at the White House. ==References== ==Other websites== * Thom Tillis, U.S. Senator for North Carolina, Home Page Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States senators from North Carolina
title: Thom Tillis
